content: curling i have no good method for single crocheting along the sides btw just do the best you can eyeballing the placement then follow attic24 s bobble shell pattern https //attic24 typepad com/weblog/bobbleshell-edging html note you don t need to add any extra bobbles at the corners just run the pattern around the edge exactly as written fasten_off and weave in your ends admire your work she s a beaut sweet & simple checkered blanket pattern page 2 of 2
